Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28391 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-28391 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.36.1-3, affected by CVE-2022-28391
